General.Name: Dook Media Group Limited
General.Description: Dook Media Group Limited engages in planning and distribution of books and related cultural value-added services in China. It offers books in various categories, such as literature and art, social sciences, and children. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Shanghai, China.

0.Name: Ms. Xiaoxiao  Zhu
